projects.title: AniHaven
projects.brief: An anime search app using the Jikan API.
projects.description: AniHaven lets users search for anime by title and view details like synopsis, trailers, and where to stream. Built this with JavaScript and powered by JIKAN API, a public API for anime.Main goal was to learn DOM manipulation and master the Full REST API CRUD operations

projects.title: My Book Shelf
projects.brief: A personal digital bookshelf to manage book collection.
projects.description: My Book Shelf allows users to add, edit, and delete books from their collection. It uses a JSON server for backend and dynamic DOM manipulation for the UI.This was a school project we were given a template to use when learning DOM manipulation and the REST API CRUD operations
